source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

item.name: Piercing Gaze of the Risen Nightmare

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Piercing Gaze of the Risen Nightmare

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.

Set: Luck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Grave-Dredged Pauldrons
Sterling Spiked Pauldrons

name: Sleeveless T-Shirt
description: On the inside collar it reads, 'Inspected by Earl Z. Moade.'

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 8,150 to 9,961 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 302 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,557 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

enchantments.display_string: Enchanted: Rune of the Fallen Crusader

spells.description: Equip: You champion the cause of the Knights of the Ebon Blade.  All reputation gains while in Northrend dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.

reputation.display_string: Requires Knights of the Ebon Blade - Friendly
